title: Organizational Ambidextrous Learning: Strategies for Creating Synergy Between Exploration and Exploitation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational management theories and learning organization concepts
context.additional_context: Focus on language education practitioners acquiring organizational learning strategies and learning balanced integration methods of exploration (innovation) and utilization (efficiency)

learning_goals: Learners can present a conceptual framework analyzing the interaction between exploration and utilization
Learners can explain three or more mechanisms for integrating contradictory elements within an organization
Learners can design practical strategies for applying integrative ambidextrous approaches to real-world cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
